OOC: I'll manage Lunekill while Robo isn't here.

Bic:

AzureBlade: DON'T WORRY ABOUT THE OTHER ONE! IT'S MINE! I WILL SLAY 
THE FIRST ONE WHO STEALS MY KILL!

He pauses, a bit surprised of what he just said.

AzureBlade: Finish the first one while he's down. They're extremely 
powerful, so don't let that opportunity go away.

But already, Rockseeker was defrosting. He turned his heat sinks off 
and his frame got very hot, very quick. He was slowly making his ice 
prison melt. He mentally told his sister about his situation.

Lunekill was almost inside long range of the base. She powered three 
fusion cannons and targeted the base. She only had to come inside the 
range limit...
